00004 // sound play modes
00005 // start playing sound now, unless a higher priority sound is playing
00006 enum SoundPlayMode{
00007 PLAY_NOW,
00008 // will not restart the sound if it is already playing.
00009 PLAY_NORESTART,
00010 // plays the sound regardless of priority, and does not allow any other
00011 // sounds to play until it completes.
00012 PLAY_FORCE
00013 };
